scripts.start:all: yarn start:coin-flip && yarn start:counter && yarn start:donation && yarn start:guest-book && yarn start:hello-near
scripts.install-deps:all: yarn install-deps:coin-flip && yarn install-deps:counter && yarn install-deps:donation && yarn install-deps:guest-book && yarn install-deps:hello-near
scripts.install-deps:near-social: cd near-social/viewer && npm install && cd ../VM && npm install
